'''''Two Weasels in a Trenchcoat... or Was It Three?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the two [[Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel]]s in the arena at the south-western part of [[Pseudostar Pedestal]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Defeating the Weasels also rewards 1 Precious Chest and 1 Exquisite Chest.
* Enemies: 
** {{Enemy|Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel|text=Tricksy Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel &mdash; Wily Wolverine's Big Bro}}
** {{Enemy|Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel|text=Stealthy Furnace Shell Mountain Weasel &mdash; Wily Wolverine's Little Bro}}

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is a reference to [https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/two-kids-in-a-trenchcoat "two kids in a trenchcoat"], a classic visual gag.
